name: Sparoku Drain
description: Heroku log drain that emits stats about your dynos to a Spark Core device

DRAIN_APP_NAME.description: The Heroku app name for the drain itself (please repeat it here)

SPARK_TOKEN.description: Access token to your Spark.io account. It's in the output of `spark setup`

SPARK_DEVICE_ID.description: Your Spark Core device ID (eg: 12ab34cd...). Check it with `spark list`

HEROKU_API_TOKEN.description: API Key for your Heroku account. Check it in https://dashboard.heroku.com/account
